name: part_006
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Chameleon' by Takane Lui.
Instrumental transition and dance sequence between songs.
Performance of the song 'Black Sheep' featuring Takane Lui and guests.

subtitles.original: 記憶の中の君と
subtitles.english: The you in my memories and

subtitles.original: 今の君はどちらも真実で
subtitles.english: the you now are both the truth,

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに色めく君はもう僕の知らない色
subtitles.english: You, blooming vividly, are already a color I don't know.

subtitles.original: 何度でも 何度でも塗りつぶして
subtitles.english: Over and over again, over and over again, paint over it.

subtitles.original: 今の君にお似合いの何色でも構わないの
subtitles.english: Any color that suits the you now is fine by me.

subtitles.original: 伝えたいこの想い それすら叶わないけど
subtitles.english: I want to convey these feelings, though even that won't come true.

subtitles.original: 口にすれば単純な強がり
subtitles.english: If I put it into words, it's just simple bravado.

subtitles.original: お隣に僕がいなくても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm not by your side.

subtitles.original: きっと 迷わない君の焦点は
subtitles.english: Surely, your focus that won't waver

subtitles.original: 迷い入る 難解なミステリー
subtitles.english: enters a stray, difficult mystery.

subtitles.original: いつだって 軽やかに姿を変えていくのは
subtitles.english: The thing that's always lightly changing its form

subtitles.original: 悲しいほど夕映え
subtitles.english: is the evening glow, so sad.

subtitles.original: 僕の知らない君は誰
subtitles.english: Who is the you that I don't know?

subtitles.original: 信号は青なのか それとも緑なのか
subtitles.english: Is the traffic light blue or is it green?

subtitles.original: どっちなんだ？ あやふやなものははっきりさせたい
subtitles.english: Which is it? I want to make vague things clear.

subtitles.original: 夕暮れ時の商店街の雑踏を通り抜けるのが面倒で
subtitles.english: It's a hassle to go through the crowd of the shopping street at dusk,

subtitles.original: 踏切の手前で 止まって帰る
subtitles.english: so I stop before the railroad crossing and go home.

subtitles.original: 放課後の教室は苦手だ
subtitles.english: I'm not good at the classroom after school.

subtitles.original: その場にいるだけで分かり合えてるようで
subtitles.english: Just being there, it's like we understand each other.

subtitles.original: 話し合いにならないし しらけてしまった僕は無口になる
subtitles.english: It doesn't lead to a talk, and I, disillusioned, become silent.

subtitles.original: 言いたいこと言い合って 解決しようだなんて楽天的なんだよ
subtitles.english: Talking things through to solve them is so optimistic.

subtitles.original: 誰かが溜息をついた
subtitles.english: Someone sighed.

subtitles.original: そう それが本当の声だろう
subtitles.english: Yes, that must be the real voice.

subtitles.original: 黒い羊 そうだ 僕だけがいなくなればいいんだ
subtitles.english: Black sheep, yes, it's fine if only I disappear.

subtitles.original: そうすれば 止まってた針はまた動き出すんだろう
subtitles.english: Then, the needle that had stopped will move again.

subtitles.original: 全員が納得する そんな答えなんかあるものか
subtitles.english: Is there an answer that everyone can agree on?

subtitles.original: 反対が僕だけなら いっそそうすればいいんだ
subtitles.english: If it's only me who opposes, then it's fine that way.

subtitles.original: みんなから説得されるほど 居心地悪くなる
subtitles.english: The more I'm persuaded, the more uncomfortable I feel.

subtitles.original: 目配せしてる仲間に は 僕は厄介者でしかない
subtitles.english: To my companions exchanging glances, I'm just a nuisance.

subtitles.original: 真っ白な群れに悪目立ちしてる
subtitles.english: Standing out poorly in a pure white flock,

subtitles.original: 自分だけが真っ黒な羊
subtitles.english: only I am a pitch black sheep.

subtitles.original: と言ったって同じ色に染まりたくないんだ
subtitles.english: Even so, I don't want to be dyed in the same color.

subtitles.original: 薄暗い部屋の明かりつけるタイミングって一体いつなんだろう
subtitles.english: When on earth is the timing to turn on the light in a dim room?

subtitles.original: スマホには愛のない 過去だけが残ってる
subtitles.english: Only the loveless past remains on the smartphone.

subtitles.original: 人間関係の答え合わせなんか 到底できないし
subtitles.english: Finding answers to relationships is impossible,

subtitles.original: そこにいなければ よかったと後悔する
subtitles.english: I regret and wish I hadn't been there.

subtitles.original: 人生の大半は 思うようにはいかない
subtitles.english: Most of life doesn't go as you'd like.

subtitles.original: 納得できないことばかりだし 諦めろと説得されてきたけど
subtitles.english: It's full of disagreements; I've been told to give up,

subtitles.original: それならやっぱ納得なんかしないまま その度に何度も唾を
subtitles.english: if so, I won't agree and will just spit every time,

subtitles.original: 吐いて 噛み付いていきませんか
subtitles.english: won't you spit and bite back with me?

subtitles.original: No No No No
subtitles.english: No No No No

subtitles.original: 全部 僕のせいだ
subtitles.english: It's all my fault.

subtitles.original: 黒い羊 そうだ 僕だけがいなくなればいいんだ
subtitles.english: Black sheep, yes, it's fine if only I disappear.

subtitles.original: そうすれば 止まってた針はまた動き出すんだろう
subtitles.english: Then, the needle that had stopped will move again.

subtitles.original: 全員が納得する そんな答えなんかあるものか
subtitles.english: Is there an answer that everyone can agree on?

subtitles.original: 反対が僕だけなら いっそそうすればいいんだ
subtitles.english: If it's only me who opposes, then it's fine that way.

subtitles.original: みんなから説得されるほど 居心地悪くなる
subtitles.english: The more I'm persuaded, the more uncomfortable I feel.

subtitles.original: 目配せしてる仲間に は 僕は厄介者でしかない
subtitles.english: To my companions exchanging glances, I'm just a nuisance.

subtitles.original: 分かってるよ
subtitles.english: I know.
